name: Donnie
text:
Donnie
"Little Donnie is... dead."
 ―Dick Tremayne
Donnie was a resident of the Dorritt Home For Boys.
Biography
As late as March 1989, Donnie was visited on numerous occasions by the Brunstons.
During one trip the couple made to the boys' home, they were told by Dick Tremayne that Donnie was not feeling well, despite being in good health the previous day.
